description: Behaviors for creating realistic animal movements and interactions

bird.name: Bird
bird.description: Creates realistic bird behavior with perching, flying, walking, and fleeing mechanics. Birds will respond to player presence, sounds, and other environmental factors.

properties.name: No editable properties
properties.description: This behavior is fully self-contained with no configurable properties.

flying_insect.name: Flying Insect
flying_insect.description: Creates flying insect behavior with different types (butterfly, bee, wasp, dragonfly) and temperaments (benign, aggressive).

properties.name: INSECT_TYPE
properties.description: Type of flying insect to simulate.

properties.name: TEMPERAMENT
properties.description: How the insect reacts to the player. Benign insects will flee, aggressive ones will attack.

properties.name: BOUNDARY
properties.description: Maximum distance the insect will fly from its starting position.

features: Four insect types with unique movement patterns

mammal_generic.name: Mammal Generic
mammal_generic.description: Creates realistic mammal behavior with walking, running, and fleeing mechanics. Mammals will respond to player presence, sounds, and other threats.

properties.name: No editable properties
properties.description: This behavior is fully self-contained with no configurable properties.

fish.name: Fish
fish.description: Creates realistic fish behavior with swimming, schooling, and fleeing mechanics. Fish will respond to player presence and avoid obstacles.

properties.name: RANDOMSCALE
properties.description: Enable random size variation for each fish (40-112% of original size).

crawling_insect.name: Crawling Insect
crawling_insect.description: Creates realistic crawling insect behavior with walking, running, eating, and fleeing mechanics. Insects will respond to player presence and sounds.

properties.name: No editable properties
properties.description: This behavior is fully self-contained with no configurable properties.
